Food wastage levels are also extremely low, with a dump rate that is significantly lower than the industry average of 13%. The last mile solution where orders are packed and delivered to customers adds to the efficiency gains. Leveraging on their proprietary crowdsourcing system, members of the community with time to spare can sign up to pack or deliver orders to customers, earning additional income in doing so.  The end result? Consumers get more choices and at better prices, farmers get access to a bigger market, receive a fairer deal and is paid on time, and the community on the whole benefits from putting assets to work which would otherwise have been left idle.
